translation.en: [announcer over P.A] This is it, folks. First race of the national junior season.
translation.ko: 전국 주니어 시즌 첫 경기 이제 시작입니다

translation.en: [announcer] And they're racing!
[announcer] And there's number 61, Scott Griffin, storming to the front.
He's on fire.
[announcer] Whoa, but he's got his work cut out for him here.
The boys in red from Katzo were the number one team last year.
translation.ko: 빨간 선수복의 캣조 팀이 작년 우승팀이죠

translation.en: They are packed with talent and they've come to ride.
translation.ko: 재능 넘치는 선수들로 꽉 채우고 등장했습니다

translation.en: [announcer] But it's Scott Griffin throwing it sideways out there.
[announcer] He's trying to hold his own,
but Katzo screams around the outside,
translation.ko: 캣조 팀 선수가 굉음을 내며 달려와

translation.en: reeling him in to take the lead.
And as we come into the home stretch, Katzo look to have this…
translation.ko: 이제 마지막 바퀴인데요 캣조 팀 선수가 첫…

translation.en: Whoa, and Scotty Griffin exploding to the front on the line
to let everyone know this young man is a real threat.
translation.ko: 어린 선수가 이렇게 자기 실력을 똑똑히 증명하네요

translation.en: [man] You got boxed in pretty bad.
Didn't come into the corners hard enough.
[laughs] Yeah, I sucked. Should have won that, eh?
Oh, wait, I did!
Oi, I'm your coach. I know a few things.
translation.ko: 야, 난 네 코치야 나도 알 만큼 안다고

translation.en: Since when?
It's our year. I can feel it.
I'm glad you think so,
'cause I reckon we make the announcement… now.
A bit of a treat for you today, ladies and gents.
Got a real legend of the circuit with us.
Former Aussie motocross champ, Cam Griffin!
translation.ko: 호주 모터크로스 챔피언이셨던 캐머런 그리핀 씨!

translation.en: It's been a while since we've seen you flying round the track, Griffo,
translation.ko: 트랙을 날아다니는 모습을 뵌 지 꽤 된 거 같은데요, 그리포

translation.en: but we've been seeing plenty of young Scotty.
translation.ko: 하지만 아드님 스콧은 꽤 자주 봤고요

translation.en: Yeah, he's doing alright.
Better than alright! Number four last year.
Now, you've got some news for us.
Why don't I let Scott tell you?
[announcer] So, Scott, what have you and your dad got for us?
We're opening an academy.
A riding academy, Brian.
It's called MaveriX.
[Brian] MaveriX, eh? Well, tell us a bit more.
Six weeks over the holidays up at Alice Springs.
We're gonna get the best riders together, have 'em come stay at our place,
translation.ko: 최고의 라이더들을 뽑아 우리 훈련장에서 합숙하면서

translation.en: do heaps of training, heaps of racing.
We're building a team and we're taking it to the Nationals.
translation.ko: 팀을 꾸려서 전국 대회에 나갈 겁니다

translation.en: [Man] Katzo's number one!
Well, if anyone can do it, folks, believe me, it's the Griffins.
translation.ko: 이런 걸 할 수 있는 사람은 그리핀 부자뿐이죠

translation.en: -We're bringing home the title, Brian. -Let's hear it for MaveriX.
translation.ko: 우승 타이틀을 되찾을 겁니다 매버릭스를 위해 박수 주시죠!

translation.en: I reckon we'll be seeing a lot more of them this season.
translation.ko: 이번 시즌에는 이분들을 더 자주 볼 수 있겠네요

translation.en: We better start finding some riders, huh? Yeah. Come on.
[man] Hey, Bryce! Get back here.
What's the go? What's up with it?
I can have a look at it if you want.
[man] If you can fix it, you can race it. He's not gonna need it today.
translation.ko: 고쳐서 경주 참가하든가 저 녀석은 오늘 글렀으니

translation.en: [announcer] All riders for heat two, make your way over to the staging area.
translation.ko: 예선 2조 참가자 여러분 대기 지점으로 모여주시기 바랍니다

translation.en: All riders for heat two.
Another strong field here.
Riders almost set now. Just waiting on…
translation.ko: 출발 준비가 끝난 참가자들이 모두 기다리…

translation.en: [laughs] Hello! Who do we have here?
Guess we'll find out!
Interesting look.
[announcer] Heat one was a cracker. Let's see what they've got in heat two.
Racing!
Oh, and the latecomer's getting off to a great start.
Into the first corner and he powers through.
translation.ko: 첫 번째 코너를 여유 있게 통과합니다

translation.en: And we see Katzo taking a grip on this race early.
translation.ko: 캣조 팀 선수가 초반부터 선두로 나섭니다

translation.en: But that man in black is hanging in there,
making Clements and Hemmes from Katzo work for it.
translation.ko: 덕분에 캣조의 클레멘츠와 힘스 선수가 애를 먹습니다

translation.en: Into the next corner. They slingshot out again.
And this mystery rider's got a unique style
but he's not giving an inch.
Look at him fly, sailing out to a massive lead.
Into the home straight, on the run to the finish.
Looks like it's all over.
[laughs] Hang on, I spoke too soon!
Number 24 has come out of nowhere to snatch the win.
What a finish! Another fantastic heat. Who was that guy?
Oh, too slow, Scotty. Guess you're used to it by now, right?
translation.ko: 늦었어, 스콧 이제 이런 거 익숙할 텐데?

translation.en: Big win, especially for a chick.
Nope, just a big win.
I'm Jason Cox from Katzo Racing and this is…
translation.ko: 난 캣조 레이싱의 제이슨 콕스고 이쪽은…

translation.en: Lawson Tyler. I know who he is.
That's right. Current national champ.
Not for long.
I like her.
-Oh, you killed it! -That was so good, love!
-[Scott] Hey, I know that guy. -Go to work.
Hey, it's Richie, right?
-You remember me? -Yeah.
translation.ko: - 리치 맞지? - 나 기억하네 앨리스 트랙에서 봤잖아

translation.en: Seen you round the track in Alice.
Mate, that was an amazing race.
[woman] Richie? Rich? Richie?
Thanks, uh… I can't. I've gotta go.
What'd you do?
Hey, you crushed that race.
Was I meant to understand that?
Tell me something I don't know.
OK.
Me and my dad, we're starting an academy for elite riders.
translation.ko: 우리 아빠랑 내가 엘리트 라이딩 아카데미를 열 거야

translation.en: Who are you guys?
-Oh, I'm Scott… -[laughs] You sucker.
translation.ko: 아, 난 스콧… 놀려먹기 좋네, 누군진 알지

translation.en: I know who you are.
What I want to know is whether you guys are supplementing the track work.
translation.ko: 내가 궁금한 건 트랙 기술을 향상시켜 줄 수 있는지야

translation.en: Yeah, course. With what?
Heaps of stuff. Like?
-Well, we're gonna… We… -Nice try.
But why would I come to Alice Springs? You're not even sure what you're doing.
[announcer] Great start to the season here, folks.
And the good news is we're gonna finish up here as well.
translation.ko: 좋은 소식은 마무리도 여기서 한다는 거죠

translation.en: The Australian Motocross Association is proud to announce
that the MX Nationals will be held at this very track.
translation.ko: NS 내셔널스가 바로 이 트랙에서 열린답니다

translation.en: So take a good look because some of you will be back here soon
translation.ko: 그러니 잘 봐두세요 여러분 중 몇 분은 우승을 다투러

translation.en: fighting for the crown.
translation.ko: - 여기 또 오셔야 할 테니 - 아저씨

translation.en: Hey, did you work these levers?
With tools or the power of your mind?
translation.ko: 고친 거예요 고칠 생각만 한 거예요?

translation.en: Do I have to do everything?
See anything you like?
translation.ko: - 맘에 드는 거 있으셔? - 멋진 장비야

translation.en: It's awesome gear. Pity, though.
translation.ko: - 맘에 드는 거 있으셔? - 멋진 장비야 안타깝네, 꼭 못 타는 라이더들이 장비발 세우더라

translation.en: Guys with the best kit are always the worst riders.
translation.ko: 안타깝네, 꼭 못 타는 라이더들이 장비발 세우더라

translation.en: [announcer] Gold Coast boy Kaden Li chewing up the track out there.
translation.ko: 골드코스트 보이 케이든 리가 트랙을 씹어 먹고 있네요

translation.en: It's only his second season on the national circuit,
translation.ko: 전국 대회는 고작 두 번째 출전인데

translation.en: but he is really making his mark.
And as they turn for home,
he streaks away to book his place in the final.
translation.ko: 엄청난 속도로 최종 결승 자리를 찜해 놓습니다

translation.en: What a day of racing we've had so far!
Him! We want him.
Where's my protein shake?
[Griffo] G'day. You got time for a chat?
Hey, Mr. Griffin!
Oh, Griffo's fine. Just wanted to talk to you
translation.ko: 그냥 그리포라고 불러 내가 새 훈련 프로그램을 시작하기로 했거든

translation.en: about a new development program I'm starting.
translation.ko: 내가 새 훈련 프로그램을 시작하기로 했거든

translation.en: Me and my son, actually.
translation.ko: 내가 새 훈련 프로그램을 시작하기로 했거든 아들과 같이 할 거야

translation.en: Cool, yeah. We were joking around before.
[Griffo] It's called MaveriX.
Wanted to know if you're up for the challenge.
That sounds amazing. I've just gotta contact my dad.
Mr. Cox, I'm Kaden Li. Right, yeah, I got your emails.
translation.ko: - 콕스 씨, 케이든 리인데요 - 그래, 이메일 받았네

translation.en: Yeah, I know Katzo's recruiting and I'm getting other offers.
translation.ko: 캣조 팀 선수 구한다면서요 저도 영입 제의 많아요

translation.en: You're a good rider, but I've got plenty of those.
translation.ko: 괜찮은 선수인 건 아는데 그런 선수는 많거든

translation.en: [Mr. Cox] You beat my number one rider, Lawson Tyler, in the final,
translation.ko: 최종 결승에서 우리 팀 톱 로슨 타일러를 이기면

translation.en: we'll talk.
[Lawson] Thanks for dropping in!
[Lawson] I am gonna win the Nationals again this year. Trying to convince me or yourself?
translation.ko: - 올해 전국 대회 또 이길 거야 - 선포냐, 다짐이냐?

translation.en: I'm not trying to convince anyone. It's just a fact.
-What do you want, Lawson? -I wanna help you.
You wanna help me? Someone's gotta tell you that you're not your dad.
And building a team around you isn't going to change that.
translation.ko: 팀을 꾸린다고 그 사실이 바뀌진 않아

translation.en: You better walk away now.
You don't have to get hurt, Scotty. Just don't get in my way.
translation.ko: 네 주제에 상처받을 일은 아니지 나 방해만 하지 마

translation.en: [announcer] All the heats are done. All the gates are loaded.
The best of the best ready and raring to go head to head in the final.
translation.ko: 최고의 선수들이 결승에서 다툴 준비를 마치고

translation.en: First points for the season are on the line.
And there we see the last bike in,
reigning national champion, Lawson Tyler.
Come on, mate. Let's do this.
[announcer] Thirty-second board is up.
Marshals are clearing the track.
Riders are set.
It all comes down to this.
[announcer] And they're away in the final of the Adelaide Invitational.
Lawson Tyler punching to an early lead.
But into the first corner, Scotty Griffin,
riding for new team MaveriX, is taking it to him.
translation.ko: 신규 팀 매버릭스의 선수 스콧 그리핀의 도전을 받습니다

translation.en: [announcer] Hemmes and Clements from Katzo, Peterson and Li all in the hunt.
translation.ko: 캣조의 핸슨 클레멘츠와 피터슨, 리도 뒤따릅니다

translation.en: Up front, the competition's fierce.
Griffin and Tyler neck and neck.
But creeping up is the winner of heat two, Jenny Chivas.
Ooh, and Tyler and Griffin lock horns
with Griffin coming off second best.
Now it's Tyler and Chivas charging on
with Hemmes and Clements right behind.
Scott Griffin and MaveriX have got a lot of work to do
translation.ko: 매버릭스의 스콧 그리핀이 앞선 선수들을 따라가려면

translation.en: with this pack storming away. But here comes Griffin.
Up front, Jenny Chivas is making her move,
keeping Tyler in check,
the rest of the pack breathing down their necks.
Behind them, Griffin is fighting back.
Look at him go!
And he's not the only one. Alice Springs rider Richie Peterson
translation.ko: 그리핀뿐이 아니군요 앨리스스프링스 라이더 리치 피터슨이

translation.en: taking an outside line there.
The battle for position is red hot.
But it's Tyler and Chivas wrestling for the lead.
Griffin's not giving up, though. He's making up ground.
translation.ko: 그리핀도 포기 안 하네요 바짝 쫓아옵니다

translation.en: Kaden Li isn't gonna be left behind either.
Sweeping around into the home straight, it's Tyler and Chivas
translation.ko: 마지막 직선 코스를 휩쓸며 타일러와 치배스가 등장하고

translation.en: and Scotty Griffin with a late charge.
They're leaving it all out on the track, folks.
translation.ko: 모든 선수가 온 힘을 다해 보지만 결국 로슨 타일러 선수가

translation.en: But it's Tyler, Lawson Tyler, taking the flag
translation.ko: 모든 선수가 온 힘을 다해 보지만 결국 로슨 타일러 선수가 애들레이드 인비테이셔널의 우승 깃발을 획득하고

translation.en: to win the Adelaide Invitational
with Scott Griffin a courageous second
and Jenny Chivas third.
Thank you.
Go, Scotty!
Yeah, thanks.
I told you, you don't have to get hurt.
translation.ko: 거봐, 넌 상처받을 주제가 못 된다니까

translation.en: [man] Go, Katzo!
Whoa!
-I'm in. -Yeah?
You were on fire out there.
Can't wait to destroy you at the MaveriX track.
-[woman] You were amazing! -[Griffo] Hey, check this out.
Hey, that was a big move out there.
You've got good instincts. You wanna make the most of them,
translation.ko: 감이 좋던데 좀 더 살려보고 싶지 않아?

translation.en: we've got a spot for you at MaveriX.
[woman] Richard Jupurrurla Peterson!
Don't you move a muscle!
Mum! Dad!
-You're here. -Don't play dumb.
translation.ko: 엄마, 아빠, 오셨네요 지금 장난해? 종일 우리 피해 도망 다녔잖아

translation.en: You've been ducking us all day.
translation.ko: 지금 장난해? 종일 우리 피해 도망 다녔잖아

translation.en: Look at you! Look at your uniform.
[his mother] The school called. They know you've been sneaking out.
translation.ko: 학교에서 전화 왔어 수업 안 듣고 튄 거 다 안다고

translation.en: Now you think you can ignore our calls.
Mum, Dad, this is 'Griffo' Griffin.
G'day. They're all a bit of a handful at this age, eh?
translation.ko: 안녕하세요 저 나이엔 다들 속 좀 썩이죠?

translation.en: I could think of a few more choice words.
Hey, your dad used to take Richie to the track in Alice, right?
translation.ko: 리치 외할아버님이 리치랑 앨리스 트랙에 자주 오셨죠?

translation.en: He was incredible. Thank you.
The way he worked with the bikes, the way he worked with Richie.
Anyway, we're starting up a new riding academy. It would be great to have him.
translation.ko: 저희가 새 라이딩 아카데미를 여는데 리치가 오면 좋겠어요

translation.en: Yeah, I'm gonna be workin' them pretty hard over the break.
translation.ko: 방학 동안 아주 빡세게 가르칠 겁니다

translation.en: The only thing he'll be working on is his scholarship.
If you don't pull your socks up, son, you're gonna lose it.
[his dad] We need to get back to Alice and you need to get to work.
Sorry, but the answer's no.
Move it, mister. We've got a long drive.
translation.ko: 안 오고 뭐 해? 갈 길이 멀어

translation.en: Come on.
[Richie] Thanks anyway.
-Can I just say that… -No.
-The thing is I know I could… -She said no.
But if I get all my work done… Keep talking and you'll be walking home.
translation.ko: - 공부 다 하고 나면… - 집까지 걸어갈 거면 계속 떠들어

translation.en: You don't start talking soon and it's country music all the way home.
translation.ko: 계속 입 닫고 있으면 밤새 컨트리뮤직 튼다

translation.en: One rider. That's all we got out of today.
translation.ko: 딱 한 명, 종일 딱 한 명 영입했어

translation.en: No, it's not.
You got a taste of what it's gonna take.
I mean it, mate. You want the championship, ain't gonna be easy.
translation.ko: 진짜야, 챔피언 되는 게 그렇게 쉽지 않다니까

translation.en: -I know. -[Griffo] Good.
-I'm glad you're disappointed. -Why?
translation.ko: 좋아, 실망했다니 다행이네 - 왜? - 널 다그쳐 줄 팀이 필요하니까

translation.en: You need a team to push you.
translation.ko: - 왜? - 널 다그쳐 줄 팀이 필요하니까

translation.en: Alright.
Where do I sign?
You gonna get out and give us a hand? I thought you didn't like me tinkering.
We need to get on the road.
translation.ko: 빨리 출발해야 하는데 꼭 지금 이래야겠냐?

translation.en: -Now's not a good time, alright? -I think now's the perfect time.
translation.ko: 빨리 출발해야 하는데 꼭 지금 이래야겠냐? 그러니까 지금이 딱이죠

translation.en: Richie!
I really want to go to MaveriX and you won't even talk about it.
translation.ko: 매버릭스에 가고 싶은데 말도 못 꺼내게 하잖아요

translation.en: Not like this, we won't.
Should get us to a service station. Thank you.
translation.ko: - 정비소까진 갈 수 있을 거예요 - 고맙다

translation.en: [his dad] It's good to be handy, Rich, but there are more important things.
translation.ko: 손재주 있는 건 좋은데 더 중요한 게 있어

translation.en: The school's gonna kick you out if you don't pass the make-up exam, you get that?
translation.ko: 재시험에 통과 못 하면 넌 퇴학당해, 알아?

translation.en: [his mum] You've only got till the end of the holidays.
And if we're even thinking of letting you do this MaveriX thing,
translation.ko: 매버릭스를 하게 해줄지 말지 생각이라도 해보려면

translation.en: we wanna know that you're gonna study every day too.
translation.ko: 공부도 매일 할 거라고 확신시켜 줘야 해

translation.en: And you won't stay there. You'll be at home with us every night.
translation.ko: 그리고 거기 사는 건 안 돼 잠은 집에서 자

translation.en: [Scott] So that's the house. We've got the chill-out shed.
There's a workshop up there. And this is the track.
Starts here, loops around the other side of the hill.
The website said 'state-of-the-art training'.
-Yeah. -This is false advertising.
translation.ko: - 웹사이트에선 첨단 훈련이라던데 - 맞아 - 이 정도면 허위 광고지 - 뭔 소리야?

translation.en: [Scott] What are you talking about? We just upgraded everything.
translation.ko: - 이 정도면 허위 광고지 - 뭔 소리야? 다 업그레이드 해놨잖아 뭐가 더 필요해?

translation.en: What else could you need?
translation.ko: 다 업그레이드 해놨잖아 뭐가 더 필요해?

translation.en: A gym. A pool for resistance training.
Yeah, waterhole's two kay that way.
-This is not what we paid for. -Yeah, it is.
translation.ko: 이러려고 돈 낸 거 아닌데 아니긴? 우린 그리포 때문에 온 거잖아

translation.en: We're here for Griffo.
translation.ko: 아니긴? 우린 그리포 때문에 온 거잖아

translation.en: Where are we sleeping?
No way.
This is, like, against the Geneva Convention or something.
-We do have rights. -Yeah.
You've got the right to sleep outside.
Well, I'm not sleeping next to her.
[Scott] Oh, no. She's sleeping in the house. You get my room.
translation.ko: 쟤는 집에서 자, 내 방 내줄 거야

translation.en: What? Why am I getting punished?
translation.ko: - 나 왜 벌 받아? - 왜 쟤만 특별 대우야?

translation.en: -Why the special treatment? -Hey! Who's hungry?
translation.ko: - 나 왜 벌 받아? - 왜 쟤만 특별 대우야? 배고픈 사람? 나와

translation.en: Grab a plate.
So, it's great having you all here.
If you've got any questions, any worries, I'm always around.
translation.ko: 질문이든 고민이든 있으면 아무 때나 물어봐

translation.en: And if I'm not, talk to Scott.
That's it.
Train hard, do as I say,
you'll be surprised how far we can go.
Alright, I've gotta make some calls, so, um… yeah.
You really think you can beat Katzo? Yeah, I know we can.
translation.ko: - 정말 캣조를 이길 수 있다고? - 당연하지

translation.en: Who's Griffo gonna back when I start owning you?
translation.ko: 내가 널 깨부수면 그리포는 누구 편들까?

translation.en: Me, 'cause I'm gonna own both of you.
translation.ko: 나, 내가 너희 둘 다 깨부술 거거든

translation.en: I've held places for them. There's no way I can fill those slots now.
translation.ko: 이미 두 자리 비워 뒀는데? 새로 채울 방법도 없다고

translation.en: Oh, forget it. Don't waste my time!
Those two riders from Perth who were supposed to be arriving tomorrow…
translation.ko: 내일 퍼스에서 오기로 했던 라이더 두 명

translation.en: They're not coming?
Apparently they got a personal call from Lawson Tyler.
translation.ko: 로슨 타일러가 직접 전화를 했나 봐

translation.en: We'll do it without 'em, then. The numbers don't work without them.
translation.ko: - 우리끼리 할 수 있어 - 인원수가 부족해

translation.en: Dad, it's my last year of juniors.
If I want to get a contract, I need MaveriX to work.
And I need us not to go broke, mate.
translation.ko: 우리 집 파산도 안 해야 하고

translation.en: Alright?
I ploughed all our savings, everything we've got,
translation.ko: 우리 저축한 거랑 전 재산 탈탈 털어서

translation.en: into the track upgrades and insurances.
Without those riders, we need sponsorship.
For that, we need some kind of X-factor.
And we need it soon.
[commentator] And it's Griffin, Griffin running away…
[Jenny] You've gotta admit, he's not bad.
-Told you. -Whatever.
He's not gonna save you out on that track.
translation.ko: - 트랙에서 널 구해주진 않을걸 - 날 구해?

translation.en: Save me? 'Cause you're such a beast?
translation.ko: - 트랙에서 널 구해주진 않을걸 - 날 구해? 네가 그렇게 무서우셔?

translation.en: Yeah, I think I'll be fine.
Besides, you don't want to make my duwende angry.
translation.ko: 그리고 우리 두웬데 님 성질은 안 건드리는 게 좋을걸

translation.en: [Kaden] Your d-what?
[Jenny] The spirit that protects my family.
Like Filipinos are the only ones with spirits haunting them.
If we're gonna do this, we might as well start now.
translation.ko: 어차피 할 거면 빨리 시작하는 게 낫지

translation.en: Who's up for it?
[Scott] You took your time. You ready?
[Jenny] Ready to smash you.
Hey, did I mention the snakes? -What? -[Jenny laughs]
translation.ko: - 내가 뱀 있다는 말 했던가? - 뭐라고?

translation.en: Don't fall off.
